A wearable device that translates visual information into audio cues, allowing individuals with visual impairments to navigate their surroundings more easily.
A device that uses AI to recognize patterns in the environment and provide audio cues to guide users through it.
A smart watch that can detect when its wearer is near an object or landmark and provide audio feedback.
A machine learning algorithm that can be trained on images of different objects to accurately describe them to individuals with visual impairments.
A portable device that can convert written text into speech, making it easier for individuals with visual impairments to read books, articles, and other written materials.
